name: The $100 Paranormal Challenge
description:
An eccentric stage magician, in his crusade against "malarkey", has issued a challenge: if anyone can prove that they have a paranormal ability, he will pay them the sum of one hundred (100) U.S. dollars. Are you up to the task? Will you prove that the supernatural is real and go home a hundredaire, or will you retire in shame?

Try to find all 4 endings! (if you're having trouble, check out the strategy guide!)

(commentary video coming soon)
